item.title: How to Run Code Snippet in Heroku Rails Console
item.description: Often in my day to day work, I need to run a snippet in rails console to fix or investigate issues. Since our application is hosted on Heroku, I can do this by running heroku rails console --app app-name and in a matter of seconds I am connected to the rails console on production. In some cases, I need to run a really long code snippet especially if the fix needs to touch a lot of data.
